Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend , conducted at 80 °C optimized coating temperature , showed relatively high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend |
| Conducted at 80 °C |
| Optimized coating temperature |
| Relatively high power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| Ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| Ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% |

Explanation:

The entities "PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend" and "optimized coating temperature" do not clearly refer to material properties as they describe the process of fabricating the PSCs and the temperature at which the optimization was conducted, respectively. Therefore, they are not considered valid entities for this question. The valid entities are the "power conversion efficiency (PCE)" and its "ranging value" from 8.22 to 9.93%.
